article.name: London 2012 - Olympic Logo Idea
article.description:
So, lots of people didn\'t like the proposed London 2012 Olympic logo, and BBC News 24 quizzed viewers to send in their comments. Some people sent in their own submissions, and so an invite went out for more.
The image above is my submission.
article.keywords: 2012 London Olympics logo widley criticised vector map world continents olympic logos
